title: Luminary Exhibition Celebration: THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU.
title_display: Luminary Exhibition Celebration: THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU.
hero_caption: Artist’s rendering of exhibition entryway at the Art Institute of Chicago, 2011/2020. Courtesy of the artist.
short_description: Immerse yourself in full breadth of Barbara Kruger's career— from early and rarely seen “pasteups”to site-specific installations, animations, and multichannel video installations. Enjoy a welcome from Robyn Farrell, associate curator in Modern and Contemporary Art, and the ability to view the exhibition without crowds.
list_description: Enjoy a lively evening celebrating Barbara Kruger's monumental exhibition with a welcome from Robyn Farrell, associate curator of Modern and Contemporary Art, and an exhibition viewing.
description:
Enjoy a lively evening celebrating Barbara Kruger's monumental exhibition with a welcome from Robyn Farrell, associate curator of Modern and Contemporary Art, and an exhibition viewing.

In advance of the evening, Luminary members are encouraged to join the Virtual Member Lecture on September 17 as Robyn Farrell discusses how artist Barbara Kruger combines images with provocative text to expose and undermine the power structures that contain and construct our daily lives. Farrell considers the underlying concepts of Kruger’s work and the “anti-retrospective” approach to the exhibition THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU.

We are grateful to the enduring resilience and support of Luminary. Enjoy a selection of treats from All Together Now as you head home. Thank you and cheers!

Open exclusively to Luminary members. Physical distancing and other visiting policies must be observed. These include but are not limited to wearing a face covering and not attending if you are experiencing any Covid-19 symptoms.

Please be mindful that some people may have varying levels of comfort as we navigate each phase of the city of Chicago's COVID-19 response plan. We encourage you to be respectful of personal space and considerate of your neighbors as we begin to socialize more and attend events. We are excited to welcome you back to the galleries, so let’s all do our part to make sure everyone feels safe and welcome.

Valet services will be available for this event.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
